Specialized run_regional method for mvpa_model

run_regional.mvpa_model.Rd

This method wraps run_regional_base with default arguments for an mvpa_model object.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'mvpa_model'
run_regional(
  model_spec,
  region_mask,
  coalesce_design_vars = FALSE,
  processor = NULL,
  verbose = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

model_spec

An mvpa_model object.

region_mask

A mask for the brain regions.

coalesce_design_vars

If TRUE, merges design variables into the prediction table.

processor

An optional processor function for each region.

verbose

If TRUE, prints progress messages.

...

Additional arguments passed to run_regional_base.
